article.title: Northrop Grumman Brings Home More BACN Funds
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Space and Mission Systems Corporation of San Diego, California, is being awarded a $7,160,966 contract modification for operational improvements to the Battlefield Airborne Communications Node payload (BACN). The contracting activity is the Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Hanscom Air Force Base, Massachusetts.
